description: Demolition of existing two storey building and erection of three storey building plus basement to form new restaurant (A3 use)  and 3 x 2 bed flatsMinor Material Amendments to Planning permission Ref: PA/18/02143, Dated 05/11/2018: Amendments include: Condition 10 The condition is proposed to be varied as follows: "The ground floor Cafâ€š Use (Class E) allowed by this permission, including any extraction equipment, shall not be operated other than between the following hours of: 08:00 - 24:00 hours, Mondays - Thursdays 08:00 - 24.30 hours, Fridays- Saturdays and 08:00 - 23:00 hours, Sundays Non-standard hours 08:00 - 02:00 hours, during the month of Ramadan and on Eid. The application is to allow the approved temporary operatonal hours to be made permanent.
site_name: 295 and 295A Bethnal Green Road, London, E2 6AH
